summary:
Aizawa: Kirishima, please come speak to me.
Bakugou, resting a hand on Kirishima’s shoulder: I’ll help bury you.
Kirishima:...
body:
Aizawa: Kirishima, please come speak to me.

Bakugou, resting a hand on Kirishima’s shoulder: I’ll help bury you.

Kirishima: What??

Bakugou: … I promise I’ll cry.

Kirishima:

Kirishima: Okay fine

blog.name: maplelemoncandy
blog.title: "If This Is The End For Us, Then Take My Hand.”
blog.description:
Ash, he/him, pan, demiromantic, demisexual

I most post about BNHA and Fairy Tail

I take requests for headcannons at the moment! Please check the request rules tag before requesting!

Rambling tag: #Ash Articulates

Art Blog: @maplelemondraws

question: kirideku platonic headcanons?
answer:
Ohhhhh boyyyy

  • If you think they aren’t The Most Affectionate friends then you are wrong
  • They tend to platonically cuddle on the couches in the dorms common room or on their beds in their dorms
  • They’re kind of like each other go to vent friend?
  • They give pretty good advice to each other
  • They also talk a lot about their crushes!!
  • They will sit for hours and ramble on about their crushes and it’s the cutest thing
  • You bet they’re going on lots of double dates if they ever get into relationships
  • Todoroki and Bakugou actually manage to get along on these double dates because they don’t want their bickering to ruin the date

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

summary: What Do You Want To Do
title: What Do You Want To Do
description:
by Blackmoor

When Midoriya Izuku was declared quirkless, his mother worried for his future. Luckily, her maiden family, the Akatanis, had a system in place to protect any children that were born quirkless.

However, now that Midoriya has a quirk and is on the path to becoming a pro hero, is this contract his mother made with her relatives necessary?

Have no fear! Cousin Mikumo is here to help Midoriya decide what they should do about this odd situation, and of course, his friends are along for the ride as well

Words: 457, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Multi
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Inko, Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki, Uraraka Ochako, Akatani “Yamikumo” Mikumo, Iida Tenya, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku/Uraraka Ochako, Akatani “Yamikumo” Mikumo/Midoriya Izuku, Iida Tenya/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Arranged Marriage, Harems

summary:
Bakugo: so you been living 2 lifes with 2 guys/girls 
Tordorki looks confuse 
Bakugo:   becht you got your tube tied 
Tordorki:...
body:
Bakugo: so you been living 2 lifes with 2 guys/girls

Tordorki looks confuse

Bakugo: becht you got your tube tied

Tordorki: I’m a guy

Bakugo: I heard a lot of this a lot a lot of lies

Tordorki:?

Bakugo: the other night your dad past away. It was weried you went through the day and didn’t even shed a tear.

Tordoroki : sounds right

Sorry about spelling and grammar mistakes

summary: Without further ado, here is our third Guest Artist, Suntails! We’re so lucky to have Cat’s talents on our team, and we can’t...
caption:
Without further ado, here is our third Guest Artist, Suntails!

We’re so lucky to have Cat’s talents on our team, and we can’t wait to see what she’ll have in store for our boy Sero!

★ Please check her out on Tumblr, Twitter and Instagram! ★

First Guest Artist: SpvceRvnger

Second Guest Artist: Zillasorus

Third Guest Artist: Suntails

Fourth Guest Artist: Fenkko

Fifth Guest Artist: Mary_Supine

Sixth Guest Artist: LiterallyGlitchN

Seventh Guest Artist: QueenofLiz4rds

Stay tuned, as we’ll be announcing each of our seven guest artists every Wednesday and Friday.

FAQs | Schedule | Contributor Applications
